name: RGB Wizard
description:
Team Berry is proud to present RGB Wizard for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam

It is a Puzzle game where you joined together RGB colors to create colorful spells and defeat color foes!

Credits:

  • Peerawich Sinamornwech - Designer
    • https://sites.google.com/view/notsundk/home
